designations.description: Any string used by which Form is known, addressed or referred to

source.description: This field is replaced with sources

registrationStatus.description: Relative standing of official record status in steward's workflow

value.description: Content of a copyright statement or terms of use

sources.description: Name of system from which Form was imported or obtained from

sourcesNew.description: Name of system from which Form was imported or obtained from

registrationStatus.description: Relative standing of official record status in steward's workflow

value.description: Content of a copyright statement or terms of use

origin.description: Name of system where Form is derived

name.description: Name of organization or entity responsible for supervising content and administration of Form

administrativeStatus.description: Relative standing of CDE as it relates to steward's administrative workflow

classification.description: Organization or categorization by Steward Organization

referenceDocuments.description: Any written, printed or electronic matter used as a source of information. Used to provide information or evidence of authoritative or official record.

properties.description: Attribute not otherwise documented by structured Form record

ids.description: Identifier used to establish or indicate what Form is within a specific context

archived.description: Indication of historical record. True for previous versions.
